name: My Spaceshooter
description:
A simple but yet addictive space shooter that uses the phone/tablets touchscreen to control a spaceship. no virtual joysticks with this one. It boasts different waves of difficulty as you get passed previous levels gradually getting harder.

To control the ship the thrust and direction is controlled by just moving your finger on the screen the further/faster you move it the faster your ship moves.

Your ship fires automatically and you score based on the level your on and what enemy you are attacking.
